" Click the button below to generate a random phrase."
"Life is too important to be taken seriously. "
Living is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
Stones on the way? I keep them all. One day I will build a castle.
True motivation comes from achievement, personal development, job satisfaction and recognition.
" Whether you believe you can do something or not, you are right."
Believe in justice, but not that which emanates from others, but in your own.
Believe you can, so you\'re halfway there.
If you hear a voice saying \'don\'t do it\', it means you must do it above all else. The voice will be silent.
Believe in yourself and there will come a day when others will have no choice but to believe with you.
"Great ideas come from observing the small details. "
If one day the doors of life are closed to you, jump out the window.
"Everyone has a happy child inside them, but few let it live. "
Don\'t let the things you can\'t do stop you from doing the things you can
You can find many defeats, but you cannot let yourself be defeated.
Don\'t let people make you give up what you most want in life. Believe. Fight. Conquer. And above all, be happy!
